cards.title: microsoft​github​.com
cards.caption: A website that lets you create legit-looking GitHub links that rickroll the visitor. So far it rickrolled ${microsoftgithubusers} people, can you believe it‽

cards.title: Discord Markdown Badge
cards.caption: An SVG badge that shows your Discord username and presence. ${mdbUserCount} people use it, so it must be somewhat good. I think.

cards.title: Twitter 64
cards.caption: A page that lets you "tweet" from Twitter for Nintendo™ 64

cards.title: Wii U/3DS error gen
cards.caption: Here you can render an error dialog from a Wii U or 3DS. Because, duh, who doesn't wanna do that.

cards.title: Adobe Fonts dl
cards.caption: A page that lets you download .otf fonts from any Adobe Fonts Web Project/Typekit URL.

cards.title: Pretendo Network
cards.caption: Implemented the blog, the locale stuff™, the Mii editor (unreleased), the homepage redesign, including the infinite scrolling :0

cards.title: Neofetch but it's always Arch
cards.caption: This version of neofetch always returns Arch, on any system. Don't ask me why I did this, but also don't expect any better from me.
